text: Pablo Aprahamian (born September 13, 1985) is an Uruguayan judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 100 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the second round by Rafael Buzacarini. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan people of Armenian descent Category:Uruguayan male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Uruguay Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:South American Games silver medalists for Uruguay Category:South American Games medalists in judo Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games Category:University of Montevideo alumni
title: Pablo Aprahamian
